name: Antiquities Poacher
quote: “Yoink!”
abilities: Discard 6 cards from your hand to take a ‘Treasure’ Prop out of the discard pile or any other Movie and give it to the Antiquities Poacher.
title: Wrath

name: Bush Pilot
quote: “You want me to fly CLOSER to the volcano???”
abilities: Gains double the bonus from the “Rickety Bi-Plane”.
title: Jungle

name: Camel
quote: “I said no camels, that’s five camels. Can’t you count?”
abilities: Discard one of the Camel’s Props to save the Camel from being killed. The attacker may not choose a new victim.
title: Zulu

name: Cold Fish Scientist Who Finally Comes Around
quote: “I wouldn’t be seen with you if you were the last man ali… oh just kiss me already!”
abilities: Gains +1 Defense for each non-Native ‘Male’ in the same Movie.
title: Relic

name: Colonel Monocle
quote: “My Burmese is a tad rusty. I either asked him for directions to the sacred ruins, or I told him to go stick his head in a pig.”
abilities: Defense = 4 against ‘Native’ Attacks.
title: Nile

name: Crazy Old Prospector
quote: “We’ll be partners. You dig it up, I’ll spend it.”
abilities: Crazy Old Prospector increases your hand size to 7 as long as he is alive in your Movie.
title: Land

name: Documentary Cameraman
quote: “The bit where he cut out her heart was great, but the lighting was all wrong. Could he do it again?”
abilities: You may discard 2 cards from your hand to stop any card from going to the discard pile and put it into your hand instead.
title: Death

name: Expat Loner With a Grudge
quote: “You’re from LA, huh? I hate LA.”
abilities: May be sacrifices to save one of your Female Characters from being killed.
title: Sacrifice

name: Great White Hunter
quote: “Horrible little savages, yes… but they do mix one hell of a gin and tonic!”
abilities: Cannot be killed by a ‘Native’ or ‘Monster’ Attack unless there is no one else to kill.
title: Escape

name: Jungle Man
quote: “Me kill rubber thing.”
abilities: Discard 3 cards from your hand to stop any ‘Monster’ Attack.
title: Pygmy

name: Jungle Queen
quote: “A bikini made of palm fronds and we left the defoliant in the truck…”
abilities: Defense = 6 against ‘Native’ and ‘Monster’ Attacks. You may give her the trait ‘Native’ when it suits you.
title: Crown

name: Missionary
quote: “He’s got the whole world in his hands… c’mon everyone, sing along!”
abilities: Discard a card from your hand to remove the ‘Native’ trait from one of your Characters for the duration of one attack.
title: Exploration

name: Native Chief’s Daughter
quote: “That’s either a very ugly girl or a very pretty monster.”
abilities: You must have at least one ‘Male’ Character in play or the Native Chief’s Daughter is discarded.
title: Capture

name: Native Chieftain
quote: “Chief say ‘Oh yeah? Your hat pretty stupid looking, too!’.”
abilities: Gains +2 Defense for every other ‘Native’ Character in the same Movie.
title: In 3-D

name: Native Guide
quote: “You trust Ubushu. Ubushu know short cut.”
abilities: Gains +1 Defense for every other ‘Native’ Character you have in your Movie. You are immune to the “Lost” card while the Guide is alive.
title: Temple

name: Native Hunter
quote: “These blow guns stop rhino in tracks. You don’t stand in front of me, OK, B’wana?”
abilities: Gains +1 Defense for every other ‘Native’ Character you have in your Movie.
title: Search

name: Native Porter
quote: “Is B’wana sure four-poster bed needed for trek to sacred temple?”
abilities: Gains +1 Defense for every other ‘Native’ Character you have in your Movie.
title: Cannibal

name: Native Translator
quote: “B’wana, Jujishi say, ‘Is that a tentacle?’”
abilities: Gains +1 Defense for every other ‘Native’ Character you have in your Movie.
title: Idol

name: Rich Fish Out Of Water
quote: “Lovey, how many suitcases full of money should we take on this three hour tour?”
abilities: When the Rich Fish comes into play, draw 5 cards, look at them, and place them underneath the Rich Fish. They do not count toward your hand size but you may play them just as though they were part of your hand.
title: Jewel

name: Skippy the Wonder Dog
quote: “What’s that Skippy? You think the sacred idol is cursed?”
abilities: May not use Props.
title: Treasure

name: Unscrupulous Merchant
quote: “The Jade Amulet of Totonga? Yes I can get one for you. You don’t mind if it’s slightly used do you?”
abilities: Discard 3 cards to look through the draw pile and take a Prop out to put on a Character of your choice, Reshuffle the draw pile.
title: Stone

name: 12,000 Angry Rats
quote: “Oh,… rats!”
title: Amazon

name: Amazon Warriors
quote: “I’ve always had a weakness for tall women.”
abilities: May use ‘Native’ Weapons to boost AS. Cannot be used to kill Female Characters.
title: Tiger

name: Cannibal Pygmies in the Jungle of Doom
quote: “Anthropologists! Anthropologists!”
abilities: No Characters killed by the Cannibals can ever be brought back from the discard pile, except by “Prologue”. (Put those Characters aside from the discard pile.)
title: King

name: Cavemen
quote: “They seem to take umbrage with us claiming this land for our own despite the fact that they were here first.”
abilities: May use ‘Native’ ‘Weapons’ to boost Attack Strength.
title: Center

name: Crocodiles
quote: “I’ve never seen a log with such big teeth before!”
title: Catacombs

name: Dinosaurs
quote: “That big lizard just ate our jeep!”
abilities: If the Dinosaurs succeed in their Attack, they may destroy the Location instead of killing a Character.
title: Return

name: Evil Minions
quote: “What’s Drax want with this stuff anyway?” “I don’t ask Mr. Drax questions; I never like the answers.”
abilities: May use ‘Weapons’ to boost AS.
title: Mystic

name: Giant Ants
quote: “This is turning into the worst picnic EVER!”
abilities: May be played as a Special Effect to take a Prop from another player’s Movie and give it to one of your Characters.
title: Volcano

name: Giant Ape
quote: “That’s a big freaking monkey!”
abilities: The player defeating the Giant Ape in an Attack may keep the card as a Prop with the trait ‘Treasure’ and a value of +0 DS.
title: Voodoo

name: Haitian Voodoo Dancing Zombies
quote: “The dead have risen from the grave… and they’ve learned the mambo!”
title: Ocean

name: Hired Assassins
quote: “Kill them. A lot.”
abilities: May use ‘Weapons’ to boost their AS. Assassins never kill the character with the highest DS in a given Movie.
title: Stalker

name: Jungle Cat
quote: “Nice kitty… good kitty…”
abilities: If you have either “Jungle Man” or “Jungle Queen” in play, Jungle Cat may be played as a 5 DS Character with the trait ‘Large’.
title: Shangri-La

name: Lava Men
quote: “They are MEN made of LAVA. Which part is giving you the problem?”
abilities: Attack = 5 against ‘Aquatic’ Locations.
title: Attack

name: Leeches
quote: “They’re like vampire snails!”
title: Tunnel

name: Man Eating Plant
quote: “The guy sure looks like plant food to me!”
title: Inferno

name: Mosquitoes Like Harrier Jets
quote: “He looks like a raisin! What could have done that?”
title: Dinosaur

name: Nazi Troops
quote: “Evil yes, but you can’t fault their fashion sense.”
abilities: May use ‘Weapons’ to boost AS.
title: Portal

name: Piranha
quote: “Says here they can strip the flesh off a cow in 5 minutes… who figures these things out?”
title: Monsoon

name: Scorpion
quote: “Three minutes of screen time and HE gets top billing?!?”
title: Emperor

name: Vampire Bats
quote: “It’s just one of God’s little crea… AHHHHH! Get it off!!!!”
title: Africa

name: Why’d It Have to Be Snakes?
quote: “Just try to think of them as big, legless lizards!”
title: Voyage

name: Witch Doctor
quote: “And he said, ‘Oo, ee, oo, ah-ah’.”
abilities: May be played as a Special Effect to double the current Strength of any other ‘Native’ or ‘Supernatural’ Attack.
title: Mystery

name: Ancient Temple
quote: “You don’t think this place is really cursed… do you?”
abilities: Discard the Temple if at any time you do not have at least one ‘Native’ Character in your Movie.
title: Blood

name: Base Camp
quote: “If it’s called ‘Base Camp’, why is it so far up the mountain?”
abilities: While at Base Camp you may hand out as many Props to your Characters as you like. DS = 0 against ‘Native’ Attacks.
title: Forest

name: Headhunter Village
quote: “Do they have any weapons?” “That depends. Do knives and forks count?”
abilities: Defense = -5 against ‘Native’ Attacks. All non-Native Characters lose one DS while in the Village.
title: Undiscovered

name: Houseboat
quote: “Does the term, ‘Ship of Fools’ mean anything to you people?”
abilities: Defense = +5 against non-Aquatic Creatures.
title: God

name: Lost City
quote: “The Lost City!” “How do you know?” “Simple, we’re lost and that’s a city.”
abilities: 'Native’ Characters in the Lost City each gain +1 DS.
title: Tribe

name: Museum
quote: “Next on the tour is the ‘Terrible Little Savages’ exhibit.”
abilities: Only you may replace the Museum with a new Location, though your opponents may destroy it. No new ‘Native’ Characters may be played in the Museum. The “Mummy” always succeeds in the Museum.
title: Ape

name: Oasis
quote: “Nice place… lots of water… and hardly ever attacked by marauding nomads!” “Was that sarcasm?”
abilities: “Hired Assassins” always succeed when attacking the Oasis.
title: Expedition

name: Ridiculously Elaborate Tree House
quote: “Look, I can’t remember the password, just let down the rope ladder.”
abilities: Defense = -5 against ‘Native’ Attacks.
title: Hidden

name: Rope Bridge
quote: “Don’t look down.”
abilities: If you ever have more than 5 Characters on the Bridge, remove the Bridge and all Characters on it. For each card you discard from your hand you may save one Character.
title: Time

name: Secluded Lagoon
quote: “Ahh! It’s the creature from the Blue Lagoon!”
abilities: “Leeches” and “Crocodiles” always succeed when attacking the Lagoon.
title: Forbidden

name: Seedy Little Bar
quote: “Of all the gin joints in all the world…”
abilities: All non-Native Characters gain +1 DS while in the Bar.
title: Sacred

name: The Fountain of Youth
quote: “I think we’re going to need more baby food…”
abilities: Once per turn you may discard one ‘Old’ Character from your Movie and replace it with any non-Old Character of the same gender from the discard pile.
title: Island

name: Third-World Diamond Mine
quote: “It’s mine! Mine, mine, mine, mine, mine!”
abilities: When tallying up scores for the end of the game, this scores as if it was a DS of +10.
title: Fear

name: Volcano’s Edge
quote: “How come the Ancients can’t just hide the treasures in their closet behind the shoes.”
abilities: “Lava Men” Attacks always succeed at the Volcano’s Edge.
title: Curse

name: Ark of the Covenant
quote: “It’s the Ark of the Covenant.” “You sure?” “Pretty sure.”
abilities: Add +3 AS to any Creature card you play while the Ark is in your Movie.
title: Doom

name: Big Canvas Tent
quote: “It’s like having all the comforts of home without actually having any of the comforts of home.”
title: Adventure

name: Big Cursed Gemstone Eye
quote: “It keeps looking at me!”
abilities: No one may be attacked by ‘Native’ Creatures except the controller of the Eye. This Prop MAY be played on an opponent’s Character.
title: Eye

name: Blow Pipe
quote: “Don’t tell me you _IN_haled!”
abilities: Gives +6 DS in the hands of a ‘Native’ Character.
title: Primitive

name: Dynamite
quote: “TNT stands for ‘Try Not to Touch’!”
abilities: Blow up Dynamite during an attack to give your Character +15 DS until the end of the attack.
title: Trouble

name: Elephant Gun
quote: “See this gun? Shoots through herds.”
abilities: Gives +6 DS in the hands of the “Great White Hunter”.
title: Captive

name: Exotic Tropical Fruit
quote: “We had melons yesterday. And the day before that,. And the day before that… don’t the birds in this country lay eggs?”
abilities: Discard the Fruit to automatically defeat the “Giant Ape”.
title: Mine

name: Golden Idol
quote: “I hope the bottom isn’t stamped ‘Made In Taiwan’ like the last one.”
abilities: On your turn you may force one player to discard a random card from their hand.
title: Gold

name: Good Luck Charm
quote: “If it’s so lucky, how come we found it on a dead guy?”
abilities: Discard the Charm to remove any unwanted card from your Movie OR to stop any card from being played against you.
title: Emerald

name: Hat
quote: “What do you mean ‘Just leave it?’ It’s my HAT!”
abilities: Once given to a non-Native, Male character, that Character cannot be killed unless the Hat is removed from play first.
title: Lost

name: Holy Grail
quote: “The Holy Grail! That’s like the… well, you know.”
abilities: Discard 4 cards from your hand during your turn to bring any Character in the discard pile back to life in your Movie.
title: Grail

name: Hunting Bow
quote: “Don’t ket the bone through the nose fool you, he’s a regular William Tell with that thing.”
abilities: Gives +4 DS in the hands of a ‘Native’ Character.
title: Prehistoric

name: Jeep
quote: “Going over a cliff is NOT what they mean by ‘off-road vehicle’!”
abilities: Discard Jeep to take a Location out of the discard pile and put it into your hand.
title: Guardian

name: Machete
quote: “That’s not a knife…”
abilities: Gives +4 in the hands of “Jungle Man”, “Jungle Queen”, or the “Great White Hunter.”
title: Journey

name: Machine Gun
quote: “Last time I fired this thing it didn’t fire.” Click. “Still doesn’t.”
abilities: You must discard a card from your hand every time you wish to count the Machine Gun’s bonus against a Creature.
title: Man

name: Map
quote: “Says here ‘X marks the spot’, so I guess we should start looking for a big X.”
abilities: You are immune to the card “Lost”.
title: Fortune

name: Pharaoh’s Scepter
quote: “I traded with the chief for it. He thought it was a backscratcher!”
abilities: Discard 2 cards from your hand to stop any Special Effect as it’s being played.
title: Pharaoh

name: Revolver
quote: “There’s an old jungle expression: never point a gun at someone, it might go off.”
title: Raider

name: Rickety Bi-Plane
quote: “Wild, blue yonder, eh? I’d be happier with a peaceful, green landing strip!”
abilities: On your turn you may discard 5 cards from your hand to take a Location from any other Moviem or the discard puke, and play it on your Movie.
title: Headhunter

name: Sarcophagus
quote: “What’s the big deal? It’s just a stone box full of dead guy.”
abilities: Defense = +5 if in the “Museum.”
title: Pyramid

name: Spear
quote: “An exemplary tool for hunting and making shish kebab of people.”
abilities: Gives +4 DS in the hands of a ‘Native’ Character.
title: Hunt

name: Roll the Credits
quote: “Well, we wiped out the entire tribe, so I guess it’s over.”
title: Valley

name: Roll the Credits
quote: “Well, the ancient curse seems to be lifted, so I guess it’s over.”
title: Forgot

name: Aging Potion
quote: “My only… regret… was… drinking… that damned potion.”
abilities: Give one Character the ‘Old’ trait. At the end of your next turn, that Character dies.
title: Lagoon

name: Booby Traps
quote: “Pit traps and boulders and spikes, oh my!”
abilities: Remove one Location from play. For every card you discard from your hand, you may also remove one Character who is in that Location.
title: Ancient

name: City of Gold
quote: “How are we supposed to get a giant gold building back to the ship?”
abilities: Sacrifice your strongest character to increase your hand size to seven for the rest of the game.
title: Lava

name: Customs Trouble
quote: “I told you they’d never believe the sarcophagus was your Uncle Morty’s coffin!”
abilities: Force one player with a ‘Treasure’ Prop in play to miss their next turn.
title: Cave

name: Earthquakes
quote: “Hold onto your butts, this is gonna be a bumpy ride!”
abilities: Playing this card ends your turn. Take all players’ hands and shuffle them back into the draw pile. Then deal each player the same number of cards they had in their hand before the Earthquake. If it isn’t your turn when you play this, you must skip your next turn.
title: Continent

name: Gone Native
quote: “Ooga booga!”
abilities: Double the Strength of an Attack and give it the trait ‘Native’.
title: Quest

name: Human Sacrifice
quote: “I hear they’re looking to sacrifice a virgin… I happen to know the perfect cure for virginity…”
abilities: Sacrifice one of your Characters to triple the Strength of a ‘Native’ Attack.
title: Danger

name: I Think It’s Broken
quote: “That’s the last time I let you touch ANYTHING!”
abilities: Remove one Prop from play.
title: Golden

name: Jade Talisman
quote: “Did you see a green flash? I’m sure there was a green flash…”
abilities: Stop any card as it is being played.
title: Cult

name: Leopard Skin Bikinis
quote: “That’s one lucky leopard…”
abilities: Play after someone “Rolls the Credits” to score 5 extra points for every non-Old, Female Character in your Movie.
title: Monkey

name: Lost
quote: “You know, if that native gave you more details than just ‘make a left at the fourth tree’ we wouldn’t be in this predicament.”
abilities: Remove one Location and one Character from one player’s Movie.
title: Isis

name: Mirage
quote: “When we tell B’wana he swimming in sand?”
abilities: Stop any Location as it is being played. The person getting the new Location keeps whatever Location they had.
title: Captain

name: Mother Lode
quote: “I think now is the time to do the money dance!”
abilities: Draw 3 extra cards.
title: Underneath

name: Native Feast
quote: “It seems you’re to be the main course in a feast in my honor.”
abilities: Kill one non-Native Male Character from any Movie that also has a non-Native Female in it.
title: Worshippers

name: Out of Ammo
quote: “How many bullets are left?” “None. I counted. Twice.”
abilities: Remove all ‘Guns’ from play.
title: City

name: Out of Fuel
quote: “I always thought the “E” stood for ‘Enough’.”
abilities: Remove one ‘Vehicle’ from play.
title: Ruins

name: Portents and Visions
quote: “I’m not psychic, sometimes I just know things.” “That’s what psychic _IS_!”
abilities: Look at a player’s hand and take one card of your choice.
title: Queen

name: Power Corrupts
quote: “The Scepter of Isis is finally mine and I’m not gonna share it with any of you boobs!”
abilities: Play this on any Movie with a ‘Treasure’ Prop. Remove the Prop and the Character holding it from play.
title: Mountain

name: Prologue
quote: “A long time ago, in a jungle far, far away…”
abilities: Play to stop a “Roll the Credits”. All cards in the discard pile, except Prologue, are shuffled back into the draw pile.
title: Jade

name: Pygmies Don’t Wear Reeboks
quote: “Somebody get me wardrobe… NOW!”
abilities: Kill one ‘Native’ Character OR cut the Strength of one ‘Native’ Attack in half (round down).
title: Trail

name: Quicksand
quote: “I’ve often wondered why they call it quicksand when it takes so long to kill you…”
abilities: Remove one ‘Large’ Character from play.
title: Reign

name: Raised By Wolves
quote: “Who brought you up?”
abilities: Give one Character a permanent +2 DS and the trait ‘Native’.
title: Egypt

name: Rescue Chopper
quote: “They look so small down there on the ground.” “They’re pygmies. Of course they look small.”
abilities: Stop one Attack.
title: Woman

name: River Crossing
quote: “Piranha, malaria, oppressive humidity… And this is the BEST place to cross?”
abilities: Add +3 Strength to any Attack OR double the current Strength of an ‘Aquatic’ Attack.
title: Rain

name: Sacred Ground
quote: “You’re about to tread on sacred ground. The guides will not go any further. But that is because they are superstitious fools who don’t know how much you’re going to pay me.”
abilities: Remove all ‘Native’ Characters from one Movie.
title: Secret

name: Sandstorm
quote: “Wiped clean by the wrath of God.”
abilities: Stop any card as it is being played, or remove one card from any Movie.
title: Fortress

name: Second Wind
quote: “It’s not the years, it’s the mileage.”
abilities: Take a Character from the discard pile and put it into your Movie.
title: Intrepid

name: Stop Motion Animation
quote: “8 months to shoot… 10 seconds of screen time!”
abilities: Play any time except during an Attack to take a free turn. When your turn is done play resumes with the player you interrupted.
title: Swamp

name: Swarm
quote: “I’ve never seen an eclipse before.” “That’s not an eclipse… those are bats.”
abilities: Triple the Strength of one Attack and give it the trait ‘Swarm’.
title: Dark

name: Swing to Safety
quote: “Watch out for that…” “Oo!” “… tree!”
abilities: Stop one Attack.
title: Tomb

name: Tacked-On Love Interest
quote: “We’re miles from nowhere, being chased by bloodthirsty savages… so what do you say we make out for a while?”
abilities: Play on any Female Character. She cannot be killed as long as you have one non-Native Male Character in your Movie.
title: Mighty

name: The Natives Are Restless
quote: “They’ve been banging those drums like Ringo Starr all night long.”
abilities: Double the Strength of any ‘Native’ Attack.
title: Crocodile

name: They Sure Do Grow ‘em Big Here
quote: “We’re gonna need a bigger boat.”
abilities: Double the Strength of one Creature with the ‘Monster’ trait.
title: River

name: Tribal Coup
quote: “Mumbutu is dead, now Katanka is king… wait… now Tobobo is… wait… ”
abilities: Stop one ‘Native’ Attack.
title: Aztec

name: Trinkets and Technology
quote: “Nice island. You like this necklace?”
abilities: Give a ‘Native’ Character a permanent +2 DS OR stop one ‘Native’ Attack.
title: Beware

name: Voodoo Doll
quote: “Ow! Ow! Ow! Ow!”
abilities: Discard 2 cards from your hand to make a Character’s DS (including Props) = 0 for the duration of one Creature Attack.
title: Goddess

name: We Have to Eat Someone… I Mean, Something.
quote: “Is there any more Billy?”
abilities: Force a player to remove a number of Characters that have a combined printed DS of no more than 5.
title: Man-Eating

name: What Do You Mean We’re Going Back!
quote: “BACK? BACK? But what about the spears and pots… with the boiling… and the painful death? I really don’t think back is an option!”
abilities: Skip your next turn to take a Location out of the discard pile and put it directly into your Movie (replacing an existing Location if there is one).
title: Zanzibar

name: Wrong Side of the Gorge
quote: “I can’t swim!” “Hell, the fall’ll probably kill you.”
abilities: Player of your choice loses their next turn.
title: Beyond

name: Xtlpxctl the Volcano God
quote: “The volcano must be appeased… you’re sure she’s a virgin?”
abilities: Kill one Character from any Movie. If the Character sacrificed is Female, you may draw two cards.
title: Fire
